content.text:
Forking %8FMo3k0KVzKzQ3Cbdm10L+e9kq5BkljODoiIks637B8=.sha256:

> [@masukomi](@LzTjF5eAVC6xprPMGeNzqEP/EEBIGpM6hDaaY10hrz8=.ed25519), I plan on passing along all of my beer credits to [@christianbundy](@+oaWWDs8g73EZFUMfW37R/ULtFEjwKN/DczvdYihjbU=.ed25519)'s girlfriend so that he is forced to take her out for a bottle of wine.  Not that I wouldn't mind meeting up in real life and getting a beer with him, I just think she deserves a night on the town. :) 

-- [@nanomonkey](@+D0ku/LReK6kqd3PSrcVCfbLYbDtTmS4Bd21rqhpYNA=.ed25519) 
 
---

...I'm not sure how you could've known, but we go out to a local vineyard a couple times a year and snag a bottle of wine, and you *happened* to post that message while we were there. Beyond weird! I'm convinced that you're either psychic or you're stalking me, and I'm *really* hoping it's the former. :crystal_ball:

Anyway, photos!

![Kathleen and I taking a selfie at a vineyard](&ghsdEPYunBub1SFrip52yjqXOIWLyMm2xlrPhs1TUtY=.sha256)

![Kathleen praising the sun god(s) at a vineyard](&/4LgobqY10ZBgL0SuWGUItWUerZJ4IeQTE/PAP8T7Fk=.sha256)

We also met a friendly old cat named Jack. Apparently he showed up one day and never left.

![Kathleen petting Jack the cat](&vZvdggBF/fWwMPzMRzK3BIrQEMlFu4ODNblQra60RMo=.sha256)

![Jack the cat curled up in a ball](&nLX5pDy246bG7Ch5eJcDWCjreL0cSMTtvtbF0PCL8Pw=.sha256)
